SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Electric Cooperative relative to Azure Energy Distribution?

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aethelgard Power Grid}.

NC.Q: Was the total Electricity Demand in 1990 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total electricity demand in 1990 was {lower} than in 1996.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Aethelgard Power Grid, Azure Energy Distribution, Borealis Electric Cooperative}.
